mapper.select: SELECT system_user_role.user_id, system_role.role_id, system_role.role_code, system_role.role_name, system_role.role_desc, system_role.status, system_role.create_time, system_role.update_time FROM system_user_role LEFT JOIN system_role ON system_user_role.role_id = system_role.role_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} and status = 1
